iron skin.name: Iron Skin
iron skin.desc: Upon use you coat your skin with a dark-ironlike substance, negating 75% of damage taken during the mantra's use.

metal turret.name: Metal Turret
metal turret.desc: An automated turret that fires at targets that cross its sight.

chain pull.name: Chain Pull
chain pull.desc: Conjure a chain to pull your opponent.
